mapper.sql: id, permission_uuid, name, perms, create_user_uuid, create_time, last_update_user_uuid, last_update_time, del_flag
mapper.insert:
insert into permission
id,
permission_uuid,
name,
perms,
create_user_uuid,
create_time,
last_update_user_uuid,
last_update_time,
del_flag,

mapper.update:
update permission
permission_uuid = #{permissionUuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
perms = #{perms,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_user_uuid = #{createUserUuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
last_update_user_uuid = #{lastUpdateUserUuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
last_update_time = #{lastUpdateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
del_flag = #{delFlag,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update permission set permission_uuid = #{permissionUuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, perms = #{perms,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_user_uuid = #{createUserUuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, last_update_user_uuid = #{lastUpdateUserUuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, last_update_time = #{lastUpdateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, del_flag = #{delFlag,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: SELECT p.perms FROM user u LEFT JOIN user_role_rel urr ON urr.user_uuid = u.user_uuid LEFT JOIN role_permission_rel rpr ON rpr.role_uuid = urr.role_uuid LEFT JOIN permission p ON p.permission_uuid = rpr.permission_uuid WHERE u.user_uuid = #{userUuid} AND u.del_flag = 0 AND urr.del_flag = 0 AND rpr.del_flag = 0 AND p.del_flag = 0
